ai.summary: A short, easy circular trail in the UK, just 0.8 km long. Suitable for beginners, families, or a quick outdoor break.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat, well-maintained path with occasional grass or gravel sections. Gentle surface changes and minimal ascent.
ai.safety_notes: Check weather and daylight. Wear sturdy footwear and dress for the conditions. Bring water; watch for uneven surfaces after rain. Stay on the trail and be courteous to other walkers; keep dogs under control where required.
ai.best_seasons: Year-round, with especially pleasant conditions in late spring to early autumn.

seo.title: Hey Green Circular Trail – Easy 0.8 km Circular Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Explore Hey Green Circular Trail, an easy 0.8 km circular walk in the UK. Perfect for a quick stroll, family outing, and scenic countryside.
